message.entry: 对于常量填充，函数 padarray 要求 A (参数 1)为数值、逻辑值或分类值。
输入参量的数目不正确。
Input dimensions must be 3-D or less.
Function padarray can pad only to existing input dimensions.
METHOD or DIRECTION must be a string or character vector constant.

Expected input number {0}, PADVAL or DIRECTION, to be a valid category from the input data or match one of these values:
'circular', 'replicate', 'symmetric', 'pre', 'post', 'both'

 The input, {1}, did not match any of the valid values.
